channel.title: [PI] Compiler?
channel.description:
Compiler itself: [code]@echo off "C:\Program Files (x86)\Java\jdk1.7.0_07\bin\javac.exe" -classpath deps/log4j-1.2.15.jar;deps/jython.jar;deps/xstream.jar ;deps/mina.jar;deps/mysql.jar;deps/poi.jar;deps/slf4j.jar;deps/slf4j-nop.jar -d bin src\server\event\*.java src\server\model\items\*.java src\server\model\minigames\*.java src\server\model\npcs\*.java src\server\model\objects\*.java src\server\model\players\*.java src\server\model\players\skills\*.java src\server\model\players\packets\*.java src\server\model\shops\*.java src\server\net\*.java src\server\task\*.java src\server\util\*.java src\server\world\*.java src\server\util\log\*.java src\server\*.java src\server\world\map\*.java src\server\model\player\quests\*.java pause[/code]
Error when Compiling: [code]javac: invalid flag: ;deps/mina.jar;deps/mysql.jar;deps/poi.jar;deps/slf4j.jar;d eps/slf4j-nop.jar Usage: javac <options> <source files> use -help for a list of possible options Press any key to continue . . .[/code]
PROBLEM OF CODING: [code];deps/mina.jar;deps/mysql.jar;deps/poi.jar;deps/slf4j.jar;deps/slf4j-nop.jar[/code]
What I was doing in compiler before this happened: [code]src\server\model\player\quests\*.java[/code]

item.title: [PI] Compiler?
item.dc:creator: @EvoIllusions EvoIllusions
item.description:
@EvoIllusions wrote:

Oh, I didn’t catch that thank you.
But now you gave me 15 other errors to solve haha, thanks though.

Read full topic

item.title: [PI] Compiler?
item.dc:creator: @tyb97 tyb97
item.description:
@tyb97 wrote:

@echo off
"C:\Program Files (x86)\Java\jdk1.7.0_07\bin\javac.exe" -classpath deps/log4j-1.2.15.jar;deps/jython.jar;deps/xstream.jar ;deps/mina.jar;deps/mysql.jar;deps/poi.jar;deps/slf4j.jar;deps/slf4j-nop.jar -d bin src\server\event\*.java src\server\model\items\*.java src\server\model\minigames\*.java src\server\model\npcs\*.java src\server\model\objects\*.java src\server\model\players\*.java src\server\model\players\skills\*.java src\server\model\players\packets\*.java src\server\model\shops\*.java src\server\net\*.java src\server\task\*.java src\server\util\*.java src\server\world\*.java src\server\util\log\*.java src\server\*.java src\server\world\map\*.java src\server\model\player\quests\*.java
pause

This is a batch script. .bat = batch :derp:
there is some white space in your script that is causing all these issues. It lies here:

deps/log4j-1.2.15.jar;deps/jython.jar;deps/xstream.jar ;deps/mina.jar;deps/mysql.jar;deps/poi.jar;deps/slf4j.jar;deps/slf4j-nop.jar

Read full topic

item.title: [PI] Compiler?
item.dc:creator: @EvoIllusions EvoIllusions
item.description:
@EvoIllusions wrote:

[quote=“tyb97, post:2, topic:464044”]Please use correct terminology, that’s not a compiler, its a batch script that calls the Java Compiler (Javac).

OT: Your problem is white-space. I’m looking right at it.[/quote]It is the compiler. Don’t believe me? Come look yourself.

Read full topic

item.title: [PI] Compiler?
item.dc:creator: @tyb97 tyb97
item.description:
@tyb97 wrote:

Please use correct terminology, that’s not a compiler, its a batch script that calls the Java Compiler (Javac).

OT: Your problem is white-space. I’m looking right at it.
